lines.text: You're crushing perfectly good vitamins to give to a cow?
Dean Higgins, here's a thought, if the dog came back in only fifteen minutes, why don't you send the dog out to look for the boy?
Professor Quigley's here to pick up his severence check.
Professor Quigley, hmm? Well you inform Professor Quigley that we don't give out severence checks anymore.
But we always give out severance checks.
Well, we don't anymore! We just ran out of money!
I *know* he's on his way but so's Christmas
I know he's been kidnapped. How do I know? Because he's been gone for the last three hours looking for his dog.
Sir, a boy looking for his dog isn't so unusual.
It is when the dog got back two hours and forty-five minutes ago.
